guild.description:
This guild is about News far and wide!

Sister guild: +Commentary

#1. Things that are posted to News should be stated like a fact in the Headline.

In the sense, Headline: X happened or X said this. Not Personal opinions. 

They should be reporting.

#2. Personal slant or commentary should go in the comments, not the Headline. Commentary content (like discussion commentator shows) are not News. Commentary content will be redirected to +Commentary which is for that purpose. 

If it's News but is more an opinion piece please add [Opinion] in the title, or post in a topic specific guild. 

#3. No screenshots; provide a link, provide a source.

See Posting Etiquette pin for further explanation.

post.title: 21,000 dead people vote for Joe Biden in Pennsylvania

body:
Misleading title.  The article says that 21,000 dead people are on the voter rolls ... not HOW they voted.  It also stated that there was evidence of "voting after death" of 216, not 21,000.  

Definitely evidence of poor management and controls in PA, though, and some direct evidence of fraud.
body_html:
Misleading title. The article says that 21,000 dead people are on the voter rolls ... not HOW they voted. It also stated that there was evidence of "voting after death" of 216, not 21,000.

Definitely evidence of poor management and controls in PA, though, and some direct evidence of fraud.

author.bio: Tell the Ruqqus community a bit about yourself.
author.bio_html: Tell the Ruqqus community a bit about yourself.

body:
They picked the swing states that gave them the best chance, especially because they control most of the process in those states.  Republicans have too much control over fl and texas for the shenanigans.

They did try some weird shit in fl.  Bloomberg threw a lot of money at paying off felon fines so they could vote blue.
body_html:
They picked the swing states that gave them the best chance, especially because they control most of the process in those states. Republicans have too much control over fl and texas for the shenanigans.

They did try some weird shit in fl. Bloomberg threw a lot of money at paying off felon fines so they could vote blue.

body: Dems control nothing in GA, the closest race of all. It's interesting to watch people build conspiracy theories and become absolutely convinced of their veracity in the absence of any evidence whatsoever.  There's no fraud, no cheating. The voters simply chose Trump's opponent...again.

body: I was asked why they didn't bother with fl and texas.  The funky stuff I've seen is mainly much, wisconsin, pa.  And I already said: they may have done shenanigans in the handful of swing states they have almost absolute control over.  Bringing up georgia doesn't have anything to do with mi, wisconsin, pa...

author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: It's obvious that they did, and that they are also changing mail-in votes. Trump had more votes this year than he did last year. Yet Biden, who hardly anyone I know voted for, rapidly took the lead in every critical state after they "counted more votes". And in one case in PA a population got ZERO Trump votes. ZERO. *Or* maybe they were tampering and changed the votes to Biden or didn't count the Trump ones. You choose what to believe, but the latter is much more likely. On top of that, there was some issues with voting machines and giving people the wrong instructions to vote in some places, which would cause their votes to not count, mysteriously all in red areas.
body_html: It's obvious that they did, and that they are also changing mail-in votes. Trump had more votes this year than he did last year. Yet Biden, who hardly anyone I know voted for, rapidly took the lead in every critical state after they "counted more votes". And in one case in PA a population got ZERO Trump votes. ZERO. Or maybe they were tampering and changed the votes to Biden or didn't count the Trump ones. You choose what to believe, but the latter is much more likely. On top of that, there was some issues with voting machines and giving people the wrong instructions to vote in some places, which would cause their votes to not count, mysteriously all in red areas.

guild.description:
This guild is about News far and wide!

Sister guild: +Commentary

#1. Things that are posted to News should be stated like a fact in the Headline.

In the sense, Headline: X happened or X said this. Not Personal opinions. 

They should be reporting.

#2. Personal slant or commentary should go in the comments, not the Headline. Commentary content (like discussion commentator shows) are not News. Commentary content will be redirected to +Commentary which is for that purpose. 

If it's News but is more an opinion piece please add [Opinion] in the title, or post in a topic specific guild. 

#3. No screenshots; provide a link, provide a source.

See Posting Etiquette pin for further explanation.

post.title: 21,000 dead people vote for Joe Biden in Pennsylvania

body:
Devil's advocate I guess but most people you know probably have jobs, go to church, do volunteer work, etc. Aside from HR, I know of a half-dozen staff members at work who might vote Biden, only a few for certain. If you walk through the plant most employees either wear MAGA hats, have Trump 2020 magnets on their toolboxes, or have vacation scheduled over the next few weeks for open season.

My state was decisively Trump, but going by the people I deal with daily, I never would have guessed Biden would get as many votes as he did.
body_html:
Devil's advocate I guess but most people you know probably have jobs, go to church, do volunteer work, etc. Aside from HR, I know of a half-dozen staff members at work who might vote Biden, only a few for certain. If you walk through the plant most employees either wear MAGA hats, have Trump 2020 magnets on their toolboxes, or have vacation scheduled over the next few weeks for open season.

My state was decisively Trump, but going by the people I deal with daily, I never would have guessed Biden would get as many votes as he did.
